entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -15.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
